price: (10) And We had certainly sent [messengers] before you, [O Muḥammad], among the sects of the former peoples.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ فِي شِيَعِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā min qablika fī shiyaʿi al-awalīna
